results.deck: One of the oldest British video game developers still in business, System 3 was founded in 1983 and is still operating to this day.
results.description: System 3 Software was founded in 1983 by Marc Cale in London, England. They released their first game (World Karate Championship) in 1985. They continued to release games for all popular platforms, including the Amiga and C64. Their most notable titles, some of which still enjoy a cult following, are The Last Ninja, International Karate+ & Putty. System 3 Software is still operating today, albeit under the different name System 3 Interactive and produce games for both mobile devices, handhelds and home entertainment systems. They still use some of their old IPs for newer games.
results.name: System 3 Software, Ltd.

game.name: Last Ninja 2: Back with a Vengeance
